text: Stanley Army Airfield is a former World War II airfield located on Oahu, Hawaii. It was a temporary airfield, used for fighter planes as part of the island's defense. Today it is the golf course of Schofield Barracks. ==History== ==See also== * Hawaii World War II Army Airfields ==References== * ==External links== Category:Airfields of the United States Army Air Forces in Hawaii Category:Buildings and structures in Honolulu County, Hawaii Category:Defunct airports in Hawaii Category:History of Oahu
title: Stanley Field
